Current Interest Rates &  APR

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title=”Accurate Interest Rate” text_in_box=”no” text_position=”center” box_padding=”15″ line_color=”#f45f1f” line_width=”258″ line_thickness=”1″ line_border_style=”solid” up=”12″ down=”20″ animation=”animate_width” line_dots=”no”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” use_row_as_full_screen_section_slide=”no” text_align=”left” box_shadow_on_row=”no”][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_column_text]

Current Interest Rates

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space image_repeat=”no-repeat”][vc_column_text]

Product Type Best Rate %*
Home Loan 7.25%
Loan Against Property 8.70%
Business Loan 13.50%
Personal Loan 10.50%
Professional Loan 13.00%
Gold Loan 10.50%
Two Wheeler Loan 18.00%
Doctor Loan 11.25%
Fixed Deposit 8.00%

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text]

Illustration of the total cost of a personal loan

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space image_repeat=”no-repeat”][vc_column_text]

  • Total amount borrowed: ₹ 1,00,000
  • Time period: 12 months to 60 months
  • Interest Rate: 10.99% to 22%
  • Processing Fee payable to: Upto ₹ 2,000
  • Fee payable to MyLoanCare: NIL
  • Total Monthly Cost – From ₹ 2,174 for 60 months ₹ 1,00,000 loan at 10.99% (lowest rate, longest time period) to ₹ 9,359 for 12 months ₹ 1,00,000 loan at 22% (highest rate, shortest time period). This is inclusive of principal repayment.
  • Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of charge including all applicable fees: 11.39% to 22.4%
  • Total cost payable over loan tenure: ₹ 14,313 for 12 months loan to ₹ 32,424 for 60 months loan

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”yes” type=”grid” text_align=”left” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ padding_top=”50″ padding_bottom=”50″ css_animation=”element_from_fade” box_shadow_on_row=”no”][vc_column][vc_column_text]
